name: Pratik Singh Thane

certifications.name: Cisco Career Edge- Knockdown the Lockdown

achievements: Experienced in handling day to day activities & tasks as a VMware Administrator.
ESXi Host Availability Monitoring, ESXi Host Performance Monitoring (Memory, CPU, Datastore utilization and fetching timley reports as requested)
ESXi Host Hardware Monitoring, ESXi Host Capacity Monitoring- Datastores and Datastore Clusters
VMware Snapshot management (Creation, deletion and reversion of snapshots as per runbooks)
Creation of VM Hull, configuration and troubleshooting issues related to virtual machines.
Adjustment of VM resources such as CPU/RAM/Hard Drives, Network Adapters, CD/DVD drives, etc.
VMware-Tool upgrades as well as updating the hardware compatibility of Virtual Machines.
Performing vMotion & s-vMotion as per requirements.
vRops Monitoring & Managing vCenter Alarms related to ESXi Hosts, Datastores, DS Clusters, Certificates, etc.
Basic knowledge on updating, upgrading of ESXi hosts and VCenter servers.
Basic knowledge of Exporting and deployment of VM from OVA, OVF templates, creation of clones & golden/master image.
Daily troubleshooting activities related to VMs accessibility, availability and performance.
Experience of working in 24x7 production support environment.
Experience with ticketing tools like ServiceNow, Remedy and basic knowledge on ITIL.
